name: Buzz Off
description:
This is an upcoming video game developed by a trio of students based in Barcelona. 

  • Roles swapped in a haunted house game -“You are the ghost now”.
  • Multiple elements to interact with in a funny way.
  • Crazy puzzles to solve.
  • Discover the events that lead to your enigmatic death.

HAVOK NIGHT STUDIOS:

  • Luis Arias.
  • Miquel Guspí.
  • Kevin Elortza
